attributes.action: review all the laws passed by government to eliminate any anomilies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown should review thecurrent laws to eliminate the stupid ones for example: you can sell things to help the growth of drugs but it is illegal to grow them but not to sell chemicals to help them grow??? Also it is illegal to die in parliment another stupid law and thier are many more like this. To get gordon brown to review the current laws and make Britain look less stupis signthis petition. . .
